name: MEC Overland Stretch Shirt - Men's
description:
Taking plaid from "outdoorsy" to the actual outdoors, the Overland Stretch shirt combines classic looks with a technical build. Soft brushed polyester wicks moisture and dries quickly, with a hint of stretch that frees you up to paddle, climb or split wood. The curved hem looks great tucked or untucked.Made from quick-drying polyester with mechanical stretch.Brushed finish feels great against skin.Patch pocket.Rounded hem.Certified Fair Trade product.

Regular fit



Fit guide

Garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.




        Sustainability
